General.Name: Zhongfu Shenying Carbon Fiber Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Zhongfu Shenying Carbon Fiber Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and production of carbon fiber and composites in China. Its products are used in aerospace, new energy vehicles, wind turbine blades, transportation, pressure vessels, carbon core cables, building reinforcement, sports and leisure, and industrial field applications. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Lianyungang, China.
